import React, { Component, useRef } from 'react' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation' import "../scss/AboutMe.scss" import useIntersection from "react-use"; import gsap from 'gsap'; import { faFacebookF, faInstagram, faGithub } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import IFZ from "../image/meInIFZ2.jpg"; export class AboutMe extends Component { render() { return (

Hello,
I'm Ayman,
Web Develober Based in Leipzig, Germany.
Front-End Developer | React.js | HTML, CSS.

I'm Ayman, Web Develober based in Germany.
I'm from Syria, was born in Qatar and live in Leipzig since five years.
I'm interested in Sport, Music, Decoration and Cooking.
When I'm not coding, you'll find me doing Sport or at a Techno Party.

) } } export default AboutMe
